content.detailedDescription:
I was out in my back yard having a smoke on my hammock as i normally do. i noticed two star like objects moving slowly toward the direction of nyc. i watched them for about a minute or two and asked my wife to get my binoculars. i looked at them with the binoculars but lost site of them as my 2 year old son was jumping on me!!! i did manage to get really bad photos with my iphone due to the distance but you can vaguely see one orb in the corner of the photo. this was at 6.42pm. after i lost site of them i kept looking around to see if i could find them again. i did happen to notice a balloon floating south ( i watched it float away) about a minute i noticed another orb like thing moving south also, was shining silver. i looked at this through the binoculars also, this was more of an orange glow to it and it looked like it may have also been a balloon as it looked like it had a rope/twine tied to it. it was hard to tell what it was and again i was putting it down to a balloon on till it stopped!!! with that i kept looking through the binoculars and it was still hard to tell if it was a balloon. i watched it for about a minute as it was stationary but then it diapered and i lost sight of it as i ran in to get my camera. at about 7.19 i noticed another star like orb right above me. i saw it in the binoculars and snapped a few photos with my nikon d3000 and my 70-300mm lens. i took a good 70-80 photos in total. the odd part was when i first saw it through the binoculars and the camera it was view-able and i could take photos but then out of nowhere it was not visible any more, but the strange part was that i could see it with my eyes but not in the camera or binoculars. i kept snapping photos anyway as i could visibly see it and then another one popped up out of no where. again i could not see them with anything other than my eyes. before i forget back when i first saw the first orb with the binoculars i did see a cylinder shape craft fly by in view. i also did manage to see two of these orbs at once. i kept snapping photos and have got plenty of photos of the objects. the main object looks like a disk and reminds me of the video from the spacestation when the tether snapped!!!! the second craft that i got in the photos also for some reason when i zoom in it always comes up as a cross! the last sighting i saw the object was at 7.34pm and it flashed nearly like a light on and off three times and i haven't seen it since. anyway please find attached a few photos and feel free to contact me for other photos i took. i'm going to go back outside now and see if i can see anything else.

p.S photos are hard to see and better when zoomed in. please contact me for all photos.

thanks
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like orbs moving and stationary

content.detailedDescription:
As noted above, i've seen ufos, starting since youth.  this date (june 22-23, early morning hours) is my first conscious recollection of being abducted and interacting with these beings.  they used to show up (that i know of) 2-3 times per month.  they stopped showing up the year my wife was diagnosed with hodgkins lymphoma.  they started back after her treatment, but only seem to show up once every couple months.

i'm also a cg artist and have rendered them quite accurately.  i'll try to attach some pictures.
content.summary: First known abduction event.  i've seen 5 ufos in my life.  started at age of 4

content.detailedDescription: Me gusta avistar el cielo porque he tenido varios avistamientos ovni desde hace unos diez años, entonces miro el cielo continuamente. no sabía que existía mufon y por eso tardé en reportar este avistamiento, pues muchas veces he querido reportar varios avistamientos que he tenido y creo que los avistamientos que he tenido pueden ser aportes importantes a quienes estudien el tema. ocurrió aproximadamente a las 9 de la noche, del 16 de septiembre de 2012, en medellín, colombia, barrio guayabal, parte sur de la ciudad. subí a la terraza de la casa de mi madre en tercer piso y observé en el cielo, parte suroccidental, algo que parecía un globo pero suspendido en el aire, con luz naranjada pero se contraía y dilataba, lo cual me pareció anormal. fui por mis binóculos semi potentes y cuando el objeto se veía más grande y brillante, lo avisté con el binóculo y vi perfectamente una nave espacial tradicional en forma de disco con domo arriba y abajo, en la mitad se veía una línea con 4 luces que la atravesaban y esta línea era blanca o con la luz más clara que el resto de abajo y de arriba, el cual era naranjado. se contraía y se dilataba. su tamaño era como el de un globo sin los binóculos, pero con los binóculos era un poco más grande que una aspirina. llamé a mi hermana para verificar que lo que yo veía era cierto. cuando ella lo avistó me confirmó que parecía una nave. mientras yo enfocaba mejor el objeto porque se desvanecía por momentos, me dijo mi hermana que qué eran esas lucecitas que aparecían en el cielo a la izquierda del objeto pero muy lejos de él. entonces miré las luces que ella me decía sin el binóculo y lo que vimos fue como una estrella roja como un foco también estática, pero de ella salían unas lucecitas blancas como una fuente de agua pero en vez de agua, salían lucecitas blancas como estrellas, todas alineadas y en capas, cuando dejaron de salir, iban hacia abajo alineadas, volvieron a subir en capas alineadas y volvieron a bajar, hasta perderse entre los techos de las casas. estas lucecitas duraron menos de dos minutos saliendo. inmediatamente dejaron de salir luces, esta estrella roja empezó a moverse lentamente hacia la derecha, en dirección hacia el primer objeto que estábamos avistando. cuando se acercaba al primer objeto, esta estrella roja se desvaneció, como si el primer objeto la hubiera absorbido. así se mantuvo el primer objeto al menos por una hora, dilatándose y desvaneciéndose en forma estática aunque a veces parecía moverse muy lentamente, hasta que desapareció. las dos quedamos impresionadas y mi hermana, que era completamente incrédula del fenómeno ovni, a partir de ese día le tocó creer en estos fenómenos. no sentimos miedo porque no era muy tarde y estábamos las dos mirando el fenómeno y las cosas se fueron dando secuencialmente. me pareció una de las cosas más sorprendentes y hermosas que he visto en mi vida.
content.summary: Objeto brillante estático en el cielo, naranjado, cambia de forma, aparece y desaparece, cerca de él hay como una estrella roja estática que emana luces blancas alineadas en capas.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on rte 13 in bristol pa heading south to burlington bristol bridge on 7-07-15 at 8:02 pm.  i observed a cool looking sky/cloud/ sunset were the clouds were arranged in strange way which caught my eye. i grabbed my i phone and quickly snapped 3 pictures in a time frame of about 10 to 15 seconds. (i've taken pics of sunsets like this many times before.)i proceeded on my journey over to new jersey to see a friend. a couple of days later i remembered that i took some pics with phone of a cool looking sky so i pulled up pics to see what they looked like. i looked at each of the three pics and i could see there was a dark formation in 2 of the 3 frames. i quickly uploaded photos to lap top to get a clearer picture when i saw the dark formation in 2 of 3 pics. i looked even closer and in the first pic u can see a truck coming towards me and then in second frame the truck is right in front of me. this shows the time elapse between each picture. the dark formation moves to right. in pic 2 object moves to a different part of sky, and then in pic 3 it completely disappears.
content.summary: I took 3 pictures within 10 seconds while driving truck on rte 13 bristol pa.

content.detailedDescription: I was on a field taking my dog for a walk, it was dusk and twilight. i looked around and saw a fighting thing similar to a size of a drone with two white-blueish lights above each other, and the object seemed metal. my mom saw other ufos in the nearby locations so i was on a lookout. it seemed like a drone with wing lights but it was in the middle of the filed with no people around. it flew smoothly and by the ease of motion appeared to be really light. the object seemed to hover and fly up and down and stared going my way but i stood and watched and it then started backing up and descended brow the treetops so i couldn't see it any more. i called my dog and started going the opposite the direction away from it. i felt sudden chill and paralysis, from fear i assume. i kept glancing back over my shoulder but i didn't see it again.
content.summary: Saw a ufo hovering above treetops

content.detailedDescription: It was the sixth day of the carnival fantasy cruise and we were docked at port nassau in the bahamas.Aug 21 2015. i was on the sky deck and i pointed my cell phone at the sky and tapped the camera 5 times to take a series of pictures of the sky. it was bright and sunny and i wasn't able to look at what i was photographing so i just pointed toward the sky and pushed the button. later that night i looked at the photos and some strange object that was a green orb surrounded by a purple light was in the picture. object showed up in the fourth of the five pictures i took five photos in a five to  ten second time.. i went back and looked at the first three pictures and the orb was in all of the photos but smaller, harder to see, but it was in various strange different locations. the pictures need to zoom in but it is large and neon green in color with a violet color surrounding it. i figured i should share the pictures with experts. 0.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Took pics of sky from top deck of carnival fantasy cruise ship and object was in photos

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving buffalo chip heading to sturgis and saw some big what i thought was dome style green houses with a side building and thought they must have just been built then i saw it move a little which i was proly 4 or 5 miles away so was proly more significant then it looked so i turned around to talk a pic all my pics turnd out about the same witch was weird cuz the pics didn't look the same as it did with just my eye and the clarity wasn't as good i was using an iphone 5c and my pics always look great but this just wasn't working that well idk why so i left thinking if it's still there when i get back it must be some buildings when i returnd about a half hour later it was gone
content.summary: Was driving to sturgis and saw what i thought was 2 dome green houses then it moved

content.detailedDescription: I took two photos of the sun to see if i could observe any anomalies.  both photos show an orb which i did not see with the naked eye.  no other anomalies noted.
content.summary: Strange object found in photos i took of the sun.

content.detailedDescription:
I had this experience when i was walking on my house rooftop. as an experiment, i was basically transmitting my intentions to communicate with other beings together with some reiki symbols to connect. i did the process for around 15 mins and to my amazement a spherical orb appeared in the sky. the orb was quite and emitting a soothing continuous white light. i saw it in east direction slowly progressing towards west and then disappeared all of a sudden. 

i was very happy that my experiment worked so i decided to give it another shot just to confirm that the phenomenon was real. i took a break and  after a while repeated the process. my intentions were again to communicate and confirm my previous sighting. this time the orb showed up again briefly, but it wasn't moving and it was stationary. after a while it disintegrated.
content.summary: Sphere of light appeared out of no where and then disintegrated/diminished

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
1. i was in my room, working on my computer (during my shift as a remote customer support representative for a webhosting company in the us), when i detected an out of place light out the corner of my right eye, out the window. it was rather bright or close or both or it would not have caught my eye but i did not think to start recording immediately.

2. out of place noticeable light of a peculiar colour in my peripheral vision, on my right side.

3. a floating paper lantern.

4. it seemed to be simply travelling. slowly accelerating over a gently curved flight path, at apparent constant altitude.

5. puzzlement, bewilderment, doubt, excitement. i shared a recording with friends over whatsapp on my phone and inquired what they think about it.

6. it disappeared behind trees but it was much further away than the occluding objects.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.summary: Glowing yellow-orange coloured orb of constant luminosity flying similar to an aircraft but on an unusual flight path i've never seen planes on before.

content.detailedDescription: It was about two o'clock in the morning hanging out in the back yard with friends. all of a sudden i see what appears to me as a fire   moving very slowly across the night sky. my friend and i watched it in awe for about three minutes until it slowed down and came to a stop. it hovered there brightly for a brief moment,until it started to then become dimmer and dimmer until it was gone. weird i kno but it reminded me as a peacefully campfire.
content.summary: The only way i can describe it is that it was the color of fire(orange ish) slowly creeping from the east ,it then slowed down stopped ,then it proceeded to dim until it was out . weird i know but it reminded me of a camp fire.

content.detailedDescription:
Was on my patio skywatching which i do each night
noticed bright light coming from the northwest moving to the southeast
i looked through the binoculars and noted no navigation lights so knew it was not a plane or helicopter

i have seen other liights in the sky and this was a good one as i could see it really well without using binoculars and it was traveling right past me.
i noticed an airplane which at first i thought it was just flying by but then it seemed to be trying to catch the light, as the light moved past me i could clearly tell that the airplane or jet, not sure which was speeding up and catching up to the light. it never overtook it and it appeared to be a little lower and to the right of the light and remained there for as long as i could see both of them.

i watched through the binoculars which have a field of 367ft. at 1000yds. i could see both objects through binoculars with the airplane lower and to the right and in my field of vision through binoculars just barely in the field of vision as they were going away from me to the s/e

the light apeared to be much larger than the plane both viewed with my eyes and through binoculars but i really could not tell for sure. as the light/plane moved away i could see the light starting to fade out but the lights on the plane did not then the light was gone and i could see a tiny red color then it diappeared but i could still see the plane lights and it was still going in the same direction as if it were still following the light then i started to lose sight of the plane also then it was over.

i would hope that pilot would file a report. also i saw other planes during the sighting go by
but seemed much lower than the light and plane.  really is mind blowing to see these things
but to see a plane following one was really something.
content.summary: Bright light traveled nw to se no navigation lights was trailed by an airplane throughout my sighting

content.detailedDescription: This happened in 1994 around june-july of that year at midmorning, at that time i was living with my family at my grandmother's house, i was at my room on the second floor working on drawings for prints i used to sell when shouts of people on the street atracted my attention, went to the window that points north and saw them pointing to the sky, so i went to the other window on the opposite side, the one that points to the south, that window you can slide the glass so thats what i did to have a better view and saw my neighbors in the parking lot next to the house watching to the sky, lift my eyes and saw a procession-like formation of hundreds of egg-shaped objects parading at slow pace moving west-east direction, at first i knew those were ufo's, went down the stairs to tell my grandmother's maid to come with me to the garden to have a better view and to share that experience, she was the only other person in the house at that moment besides my grandmother who was to old to take it out at that moment, was very exciting to see such a phenomenon, the whole event lasted around half and hour, there were no clouds, the sun shone on a blue sky, it was pretty clear, so it was easy to see them, they were far up in the sky but you can see them clearly these metalic egg-shaped things moving and they just kept parading until they were gone.
content.summary: Formation egg-shaped objects

content.detailedDescription: 346am my dog woke me to go outside. now a habit i looke up over our hospital campus and yes n a line a dim small one in the middle a bright pulasating largest one and to my rt a slightly smaller bright orb. i fot son binoculars and they do indedd seem simialar to my last observance and similar to the pics my friend shot
content.summary: I reported the same type of objects sunday 8-116/8-17/15

content.detailedDescription:
I went for a short walk around 8:15pm behind my accommodation, i.E. heronbank west, heronbank, university of warwick, coventry.
while coming back, i happened to look at this glowing(because of the flame) cylindrical type object in the sky, steering upwards in a somewhat fast motion. i was able to take a picture of it.
but when i started taking a video, my phones battery died.
my first reaction to that was, clearly it's not a shooting star. it could be a rocket launch though.
after gazing at it for about a minute, i walked inside my accommodation building.
content.summary: Seemed like a glowing rocket steering upwards in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
On friday night, 08/21/15, at approximately 2045 hours, i was in our back yard with the dogs and just happened to look up into the sky and saw this orb or round light appear in the night sky. i was facing and looking south. this light or round shape appeared out of nowhere. the light illuminated brighter and it zipped east across the sky. it stopped grew bright white again, and disappeared. it traveled a very long distance in a fraction of a second. i am talking across many miles. it appeared, zipped across, and disappeared all within a couple of seconds. when it zipped across the sky, it was going so fast that it left like a solid line between destinations. 

where we live, we are in the flight paths of the airports. we constantly have jets flying over our house. what i saw was no jet. nothing we have can move from point a to point b in a fraction of a second. what i saw was at a much higher altitude than any jets fly. 

the object size, compared to the star it disappeared next to, was the size of 4-5 stars. it was large enough and glowing bright enough for me to see it quickly.
content.summary: Ball of light zipping across the sky and disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: july 29th 2015 11:30 p.M. my mother in law and i were looking at the western sky at a jupiter alignment i think. we had a pair of binoculars. she noticed a bright light over the horizon in the north. our attention quickly changed to that area where we watched the bright white light which was a little larger than what we would have expected a helicopter nearby and low in the sky to have looked like. but it made no sound and did not move like any craft i have ever seen. at one point, another large bright red non-blinking light appeared next to the white light. it was at least as large as the white light and they apppeared to touch each other. the red light disappeared. the white light stayed between two clumps of trees for 10 to 15 minutes moving forward a bit then stopping and starting. it was moving very slowly if at all then it moved more significantly as though it was going to disappear behind the trees. suddenly it reversed direction and looked like it was going to leave the area going in the opposite direction. that's when i became very startled and knew for sure this was something very different. at that time it moved directly toward us. the light became bigger as it approached us. at that time i called my friend to report what we were seeing. it was two or three houses away from us at its closest distance but quite a bit higher than the rooftops. the light was about the size of a basketball according to my mother in law. honestly i was a little too flustered to be able to remember the size of it by that time. i do remember it never made any sound. as it was passing by us my mother-in-law looked at it through binoculars. she said it had two rows of dull blue lights all evenly spaced. the craft turned sharply to the east and slightly north right in front of us and move very quickly out of sight. any normal craft would have stayed in our sight for quite a while because we had an open sky with nothing to impede our view for a very long distance. but it was gone so fast!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: July 29th 2015 11:30 p.M. my mother in law and i were looking at the western sky at jupiter.

content.detailedDescription:
date: 08082015

 time: 22:00

 duration: 10 minutes

 sighting city: east fultonham

 sighting state: ohio 

 sighting zip: 43735

 sighting county: usa

 witnesses: 5

 shape: fireball/round

 number of craft: 6-7

 description: my wife and a daughter along with three grandchildren were swimming in our pool on saturday night august 8th, 2015 at approximately 2100 hours. i was coming outside to see how everyone was doing and was not in the swimming pool with everyone at that time.
 my youngest grand daughter who is five noticed what she saw was a shooting star, about that same time i noticed several reddish/orange balls of light. at first there was only three which i thought were unusual and the i noticed three more just above tree level off at a distance. it was hard to tell the distance since it was night and there were some clouds in the sky.
 i asked what everyone just saw and they said almost the same thing i had just witnessed myself, i went inside and retrieved a pair of binoculars and tried to get a better look at them and they were still fuzzy. i tried my cell phone camera and it would not take a picture because it was to far away. the lights moved several times one in and out of the clouds and another made a drop and joined the other three lights above tree level after about two-three minutes two lights moved off into the distance and the other four lights left as well two of the appeared to vanish.
 there are no military areas where we live however there are some strip mining areas in the area. some of the property is owed by aep and was a wildlife area until it was closed off this past year and signs were placed to keep people out do to sinkholes in the area. 
the ages of all the witnesses are 60,58 31,13,9 and 5. myself i am a retired male age 60 who has been trained over the past 42 years to observe the unusual after being in the marine corps and being an ex- deputy sheriff as well as a private investigator and correctional officer and a contract security officer for homeland security. one thing i can add to this report is the way the lights in the sky acted they moved around like no aircraft or helicopter i have ever seen. the balls of light had a reddish/orange glow to them which if checked with any federal regulations on aircraft lighting is highly improper.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 6-7 balls of light changing diretcions some hiding behind clouds some not and a  above tree level.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my bed sleeping it was around 4am. i noticed that there were flashing lights by my bedroom window. it was not lightning because it had like a pulsating rhythm to them that was not like lightning. i woke my husband up to tell him about it. he went to the restroom when he woke up and while he was in the bathroom a bright blue beam like light scanned my bedroom. it flashed my face and stopped. my dogs were barking, i was afraid to get out of bed, but i can still see the pulsating lights outside by my window. they were there for about 10 minutes. i did not want to look out the window or go near it. i've been having ufo experiences since i was a child, but i don't remember ever having my room or face scanned before. the power in my house went out for a few seconds and came back. i had a hard time falling asleep after that. i was afraid it would come back. my daughter has seen shadow figure standing in her bedroom door way a few days before this ufo experience, and the power also went out in the house. i am afraid they are targeting my daughter as well. i have been experiencing headaches, sinus pain and pressure in my eyes since i was flashed in the face. i am now a bit concerned that they will come back or go after my family.
i had seen ufo sightings in the past, but never report them because i thought it would never happen again, and i was afraid of people thinking i was crazy or something like that. but now it feels like they are more frequent and i don't want them after my daughter as well. she has been waking up with weird scratches or small bruises on her body. i am concerned. also the trees behind my house has a clearing that wasn't there before.
content.summary: Bright flashing lights next to my bedroom window, when i woke up and sat up a bright blue light scanned my room, flashed my face and i've been having headaches and sinus pain. electicity in my house has been acting up as well. my dogs were barking.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home/ place of work in northern california, siskiyou county throughout the course of june-july 2015. i observed it/them as the setting sun approached each occurrence of the sightings. there were multiple nights i observed floating, glowing orbs from hornbrook ca, and montague ca. what made me first notice the object/objects was looking up at the sky and realizing logically that what i was seeing was not a star, and definitely no form of commercial aircraft. also seeming otherworldly. when i first noticed it i believed the object to be otherworldly due to my deductive reasoning and the unknown origin of the seeming like what was a bonded light spacecraft of some sort. i tried to rationalize that maybe it was a star. but i started to notice as nights differed they were in different places and placements. then one evening close to dusk, what really opened my eyes to this/these as a ufo for the first time. i observed one moving in a motion unlike any aircraft i had ever seen. one of these "orbs" of light flew over me, and drifted out of sight before i knew it. another night i observed one fly toward my direction, it was over montague ca, then real quick went straight back in the opposite direction, where it came from. my feelings were baffled. i had come to terms i had witnessed what i believe to be an unidentified flying object. mainly my feelings were, why is this, and why/ how can, the people of this world not be informed of the other life outside our atmosphere, and sometimes within our atmosphere. another account one evening i saw one fly over my from south to the north and the what seemed to zig zag, unlike any aircraft ability i have ever seen.  but the most vivid eye opener i saw on my drive home from hornbrook to montague one evening. i witnessed a pair of these flying objects in the sky hovering in place but this night seeming like they got lower then ever, i watched them start off high over black mountain and then drift lower and lower till they drifted below black mountain, as i was heading home i saw them on the other side, seeming at a lower elevation than that of black mountain. i was in disbelief. i then realized it seemed i was driving around them as they stayed in place. i was thinking, "this is crazy". then what made me assure of this sighting, i saw a commercial airline high in the sky flying at a way higher altitude then these orbs of light. and at that moment realized i was staring at ufo's within our atmosphere, right up and close. my mind was blown and baffled that i have not been taught that these otherworldly entities exist and not only that, but are in our atmosphere, here on earth. the world should know, and generations should be told. everyone has the right to know these other beings are out there, and probably countless of species at that.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Observed flying orbs throughout june/july 2015 in siskiyou ca

content.detailedDescription: I was outside early in the morning about one o'clock having a cigarette and had a strange feeling that  i was not alone and happened to look up and see a huge dark black craft moving slowly overhead making no sound it made me feel numb all over. i watched it for about two minutes . i have never seen anything like that before in my life. nothing could be that big and move that slowly . it was a lot bigger than any house in the neighborhood and it was dark outside . on a different story about twenty years ago i was outside early one morning and i  was getting ready to work on a deck out back and heard a strange sound  looked up and saw a silver triangle and silver sphere following it . the triangle stopped and hovered overhead and the sphere stopped and started circling around the triangle and then stopped under it and a abject came out of it and i couldn't move. i was frozen . i couldn't move. and then i felt it go right through me and all i remember is i felt numb and i couldn't move or see . but i do remember hanging on to the corner of the house and when i came back to my sciences and couldn't move and stand up on my own i looked up and then the objects took off slowly and then very fast and was gone . these are a few of the things that have plagued me since i was a kid . now i'm ,52 years old and i would like to  get to the bottom of  it. and would like to know if anyone  else has had these problems in their lives . like i said these are only a few of them. there are other people in my family that were also plagued with this growing up .
content.summary: Saw dark black craft moving slowly overhead making no sound .

content.detailedDescription: My wife was using her iphone 5c to take photos at the ellison bluff scenic overlook in ellison bay, wisconsin, on thursday, aug 20.  there were rain clouds to the south (to the left of the sunset, not pictured).  the sun was notably bright during the sunset, so she took a variety of pictures.  only later that evening did she notice the odd light/orange glow above the sun in various positions of her pictures.  at the time of the photos, there was no awareness of any objects flying by (and it's a very quiet spot, so small planes can be easily heard).  it was also windy during the sunset.
content.summary: Photos were taken of sunset.  at the time, there was no awareness of the odd light that was on the photos.  only observed after looking at the images.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside early in the morning about one o'clock having a cigarette and had a strange feeling that  i was not alone and happened to look up and see a huge dark black craft moving slowly overhead making no sound it made me feel numb all over. i watched it for about two minutes . i have never seen anything like that before in my life. nothing could be that big and move that slowly . it was a lot bigger than any house in the neighborhood and it was dark outside . on a different story about twenty years ago i was outside early one morning and i  was getting ready to work on a deck out back and heard a strange sound  looked up and saw a silver triangle and silver sphere following it . the triangle stopped and hovered overhead and the sphere stopped and started circling around the triangle and then stopped under it and a abject came out of it and i couldn't move. i was frozen . i couldn't move. and then i felt it go right through me and all i remember is i felt numb and i couldn't move or see . but i do remember hanging on to the corner of the house and when i came back to my sciences and couldn't move and stand up on my own i looked up and then the objects took off slowly and then very fast and was gone . these are a few of the things that have plagued me since i was a kid . now i'm ,52 years old and i would like to  get to the bottom of  it. and would like to know if anyone  else has had these problems in their lives . like i said these are only a few of them. there are other people in my family that were also plagued with this growing up .
content.summary: Saw dark black craft moving slowly overhead making no sound .

content.detailedDescription: We seen it then it moved to us and fallowed us at the same speed wile staying in front of us it had no sound and three orbes of light. one on each corner.It went across the road and dropped a pink beam down on the ground. we lost site of it when we passed it.
content.summary: We seen the craft by a tower with one light. it had 3 lights it moved towards us and followed us for about a half mile

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 1998 i was standing on my foot path in the middle of my garden in bristol in the uk when i looked up and saw what i thought was a black bag in the wind in the sky. then as it got closer i thought it was a remote childs plane as it got even closer and larger i could see it was rocking from side to side but still going on a straight path towards me as it got just above the trees at the bottom of my long garden i could tell it was a black triangle but had no sound i watch it waving and crashing towards me i didnt think to move i was stunned and as it got over my head it was about 8 feet above me so i could see every angle and even had time to study it the body was 4 feet deep the width was about 16 feet and it had 2 triangles cut out of the corners but the thin edges was still there it made no sound it passed over my head and started to climbe and gain control as it was obviously out of control before then i watched it miss my chimney by inches and i ran in to tell me partner to come and look she then looked up out the front of the housr and we both watched as it gained height and continued until it was up in the clouds there was no markings or lines or marks of anykind it was amazing to see and im so pleased i had the chance to witness this so closely i have had a few encounters in my life i hope i get the chance to tell them as all of them are 100% true  thank you for reading
content.summary: Triangle with small triangles cut out of 2 back corners was crashing into my house it nearly hit my roof so i saw it clearly

content.detailedDescription:
Sleeping in backyard with my son. i awoke for no reason and above me there were 4 bright blue and white glowing orbits above us, then 2 more, then another two hovered above us for about 4 to 5 minutes. they hovered above us but not in a still motion. it was very calming but yet emotional. it seemed as if i could reach up and grab them but as my arm went up, i could no longer move my body and felt like my mind and body was overwhelmed and or consumed. no control nor could i speak (to wake my son). as i felt calmness and somewhat overwhelmed, i could see myself below. but was still on the ground. then the orbits left 2 by 2 in in all different directions but went the same path and gone in a blink of an eye.

stayed out another night a couple weeks later and it happened again.
content.summary: Blue orbits above us moving all around 4 to 8 for about 4 min and left all in different dirctions 2 diiferent nights in early mornings

content.detailedDescription:
1. in backyard, getting ready to water. 2. it looked different, lower than a plane. 3. a ufo

4. it had 3 rows of 3 lights in each row. 1st row 3 blue, 2nd 3 yellow and 3rd 3 orange. moving at a slow steady speed heading north 10 secs., then it made a u-turn, without turning itself and started heading south.  it seemed flat square with rounded edges, like a piece of toast.
5. excited, awe struck. 6. lost sight of it going south over house next store.
content.summary: When i first saw it i thought that's not an airplane.

content.detailedDescription:
At the time of siteing  i was going to the outside loo.
walking down the yard i looked up and 3 bright lights were traveling across the night sky
each 1 had its  own colour  one. red the other  white and one blue.
they started to shoot around the night sky at  a speed that no  plane  could possibly  do then or now.
they came together  and became  one  bright light which  was  white.
they proceeded to do this across the night  sky for a few  minutes then  excelarated  of across the night sky at  unbeliavable  speed.
what ever it  was in the sky  it. was not from this earth.
content.summary: Three lights in sky then fast movement came together in one light then split up and shot around sky then came together again then shot off

content.detailedDescription:
I am only sending this at the urging of a friend and the fact that i have seen similar events on tv ufo episodes with your group reporting. 
in august of 1998 i was walking home at 1130 pm.
the area in newton bc in surrey british columbia canada was an older rural road at that time. i was approaching a old grave yard walking west when what appears is a perfectly round blue ball the size ofâ  a car it moved probably 30-40feet high and not more then 50 yards away from me.It seemed as though it went down on the cemetery, it scared the s**t oit of me.The one thing that stuck out was the crickets stopped chirping. .Anyway many years ago but i remember it like it was yesterday.
